sense.def:
To gather somewhere
pomeni nekam priti s skupino več oseb.

seg.quote: He whistled to gather the whole squad in a group.

sense.def:
To gather things
pomeni zbrati stvari ali jih skupaj prinesti na en kraj.

seg.quote: I gathered my maps together and tucked them into the folder.
The team worked for about a year and a half to gather data.

sense.def:
Kadar nekaj
is gathering dust
, ni redno v uporabi.

seg.quote: My briefcase was already beginning to gather dust.

sense.def:
Kadar nekaj
gathers speed, momentum, or force
, to pomeni, da povečuje hitrost, zagon ali moč.

seg.quote: The train gathered speed as it left the town.

sense.def:
To gather that something is true
pomeni po tistem, kar nekdo reče, sklepati, da je resnično.

seg.quote: I gathered that they were not expected to eat with us.
His wife had been ill, I gather, for some time.

sense.def:
To gather a piece of cloth
pomeni potegniti nit skozi tkanino in jo zategniti, tako da v tkanini nastanejo zelo ozke gube ali naborki.

To gather up a number of things
pomeni zbrati več stvari skupaj.

seg.quote: She watched Willie gather up the papers.
